```{r}
N <- 100
ensemble <- RME_norm(N, mean = 0, sd = 1, cplx = T, herm = T, size = 250)
# Returns largest eigenvalues of the matrix
spectrum_plot(ensemble, "Standard Normal Complex Hermitian")
```

```{r}

```


```{r}
spec <- spectrum(ensemble, largest = TRUE)
spectrum.plot(spec)
```
